EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending the BSKL Virtual Open Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName}
Thank you again for giving us the opportunity to talk about the BSKL Secondary School with you. I hope that the session gave you a better understanding of what BSKL has to offer your family.
Please reach out to us directly if you have any remaining questions about our school, community or the application process.
If you feel inspired to make the next step in becoming part of our community. The application process is summarised below.
The RM1,500 Application Fee will be waived for any applications made before 15 October 2021.
To apply, simply follow these 3 steps:
1. Online Application: Complete this online application. You will need to upload your child's latest school report and a copy of your child's passport.
2. Teacher details: Provide the name and the email address of your child's teacher to whom we can email a teacher recommendation form to be completed.
3. Assessment (to be conducted remotely)
Early Years - Families will have a parent Interview with Admissions/ Academic team. Primary - Students will be required to take a reading, writing and maths test, set by the Primary Leadership Team. Secondary - Students will be required to take a standard assessment in line with the Centre for Evaluation and Monitoring.
Thank you for coming once again and please do let us know if you need any further clarification on anything.
We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Warm regards,
Admissions Team
The British International School of Kuala Lumpur
